title: Mosul Falls And Many Wonder: What Happened To Troop Surge In Iraq?
teaser: Retired Lt. Gen. Mark Hertling speaks to Melissa Block about the fall of the Iraqi cities Mosul and Tikrit to insurgents. Hertling had been the top U.S. commander for northern Iraq during the troop surge.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
